snippet: Several Republican candidates showed new aggressiveness in lacing into Donald J. Trump on Wednesday night, using their latest televised debate to shame, criticize and mock him.
abstract: Participants in second Republican presidential debate attack Donald J Trump with new level of aggressiveness in effort to shake up dynamics of race Trump has come to dominate; candidates seize other moments in debate to present policy views in attempt to connect with voters.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and PATRICK HEALY
byline.contributor: Jonathan Martin reported from Simi Valley, and Patrick Healy from New York.

lead_paragraph: Several Republican candidates showed new aggressiveness in lacing into Donald J. Trump on Wednesday night, using their latest televised debate to shame, criticize and mock him.

headline.main: Candidates Use Second G.O.P. Debate to Taunt Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Candidates Use 2nd G.O.P. Debate to Taunt Trump
